what_you_do: I am a speaker, Author and Booking Agent for Les Brown and many more.
who_you_serve: The speakers I represent come from backgrounds such as Safety, Diversity, Mental Health, Resilience, AI and Corporate Culture.
social_proof: I am the author of 24 Ways To Get Paid To Speak.
business_focus: I run a call center for professional speakers where we find and foster leads then do the program agreement and additional work to secure the speaking engagement.
